text:
One of the great things about doing the compensation survey was potentially helping folks who were in the middle of negotiations for new jobs or raises. Heard today, for example:

“Hey, Maggie. Hope you're enjoying the long weekend. Wanted to let you know that I've accepted an offer for a new role that's a big step up for me aaaaand I got a whopping $XX increase over my current salary — so thanks for letting us all know how lucrative the content world can be. Onwards and upwards! :slightly_smiling_face:”

attachments.fallback: Your Content Career Headquarters: How Much Money Do Content Marketer's Make? (2022 Salary Report) — Your Content Career Headquarters
attachments.text: The average content marketing salary is $93,725. Check out our salary report for more detailed data on job titles, experience and pay discrepancies.
